website_summaries.verdict: If you're in the market for an entry-level gaming laptop with an extra durable keyboard, consider the Asus TUF Gaming FX504GD-ES51. Everyone else should keep shopping.
pros: The Asus TUF Gaming FX504GD-ES51 is an entry-level gaming laptop with a comfortable and extra durable keyboard, easy access to RAM and storage drives for upgrades and generally good gaming performance for its configuration
cons: Against its similarly priced competition, the base TUF's display is disappointing
It has fewer ports and its hybrid hard drive is a bit slower than laptops with solid state drives

customer_reviews.title: Underrated ASUS
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gaming laptops for the price. PUBG runs very well on medium graphics and still looks pretty damn good. Most games will run superb on High/Ultra settings. Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Lamas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed last night and straight out of the box and unencumbered by games it was already the slowest computer I’ve ever used. The windows updates took nearly 12 hours, during that time I couldn’t even download steam without the laptop freezing and crashing. After the rediculously long update period it’s still laggy and unresponsive. Don’t waste your money, this is a shiny paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: The Rambling Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Laptop great, packaging scared me.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was horrid. Laptop was flopping around with One thin sheet of that brown paper. No bubble wrap or anything. It had a two inch gap on each side where it was flopping around in the box. I was scared it was broken soon as I pickes it up. Now to get on with the laptop itself. It works very well. I play games like Dead by daylight and it hasn't lagged or been low fps or anything. It plays all my games very well. I was surprised to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Roblox usage
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his 12th b-day. His last laptop was lagging on his favorite game Roblox all the time (was a few years old), but with this one he says he's had zero issues Set up was really easy, and completely happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: If I could go lower then 1 Star I would. It doesn’t deserve even one. The product is pretty nice when you start it.... DONT ADD ANY PROGRAMS cuz once you do you are done the laptop is done. So if you wanna spend $700+ on a paper weight this is the one to go with. Then when you attempt to contact support they can’t do anything for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight B.

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are right about lagging
customer_reviews.text: The laptop does lag from opening up simple things like folders. hard drive is maxed at 100% constantly for doing nothing for the money this shouldn't be the case Asus, come on..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good! too many issues.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with this laptop. There are just too many problems with it. The touchpad lags a lot and updating it did not help. I keep getting crashes basically everyday. Even though it has an SSD boot up is very slow. It's supposed to play games at least in medium setting yet it's too slow to run basic apps let alone a game. I am returning it to Amazon and will not be purchasing another ASUS laptop.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nasar

customer_reviews.title: “Light gaming” is the key part of this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for relative, he loves it, uses it everyday for work and at home. It is mostly plastic except for the lid cover but doesn’t look or feel cheap. The 8th gen CPU is really good as expected, the 1050 also allows to play most games at FHD set in mid quality but the display isn’t as bright as you’d like. My only complain would be the lack of an SSD that would definitely improve things but again, it’s understandable for the price. The good thing is you actually got an empty NVME M.2 SSD drive slot available in case you want to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgelaraces

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine but poor performance on battery.
customer_reviews.text: Lers get th one bad comment I have out of the way first: I've tried every setting I could but every game lags when the computer is running on the battery. I have no idea how to optimize the performance so I can play a game without plugging in the PC. That being said, every game I throw at it runs silky smooth at 1080p 60fps on high settings (not ultra). This machine comes with almost no bloatware which is awesome. Currently playing GTA 5 and Rise of the Tomb Raider on high settings and it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Painstaking
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this laptop. All you really need to know is that I am writing this review from my phone. Because this computer is too slow to even browse the internet. How they can all this a gaming laptop is beyond me. Writing an Amazon review takes an hour of agonizing loading and waiting. After an hour of trying, I wrote this review on my phone in 2 minutes. Absolutely pathetic. Asus should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 700 dollar paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the box slower than any computer i've owned. Basic things like task manager, file explorer and even windows explorer (task bar and desktop) crash or stop responding. Can't install anything without it erroring out. Disk usage 100% with nothing but the bare essentials to turn on the computer running. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: my only problem is touchpad
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is good but my only problem is its touchpad. Sometimes it is lagging or works very slow. I updated its driver but it didn't fix. If you know how can i fix this problem please help me. And i 'm calling from here ASUS.. Please say me how i can fix it ?? i 'm so nervous about it.. And i want to note this too. I'm pleased with Amazon. They are really good. When i wrote them, they helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Aysel M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case beware, I would get something else
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall pretty good gaming laptop. The cheapness is in the case. We had this fixed once before where the corner where the monitor meets the case broke. After it was repaired the exact same thing happened again. This seems to be a known flaw that the ASUS design team does not change. I would not buy this again. I will definitely get a better-designed laptop. They should know gamers are very hard on their equipment. I have seen a couple of other people with the exact same issue. Come on ASUS get with it on your ruggedness and quality of your design.
customer_reviews.author: treesmp5

customer_reviews.title: For the price, not a bad machine.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is not bad, not great. It's meh. Initial setup takes a long time, and there are a lot of updates needed at first. The combo hard drive works well once updates are complete, however it is still not as fast as an SSD. The 1050 HTC model is adequate for medium gaming. Fortnight, and other games run decent on a medium setting. The track pad is not good. A wireless mouse would be a good idea. The keyboard has good travel and a nice feel. The screen is not bad, but not great either. It's decent. The screen feels a bit flimsy when open, however when closed the unit feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley M.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to do all of the software updates.
customer_reviews.text: I like the backlight keyboard. The Mouse is unresponsive at times.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I added a sata III and its very fast. I have only had 3 problems so far. When I cloned the O.S. I kept getting lock up login screen. Eventually I did a clean install and everything worked perfect except the touch pad. It still doesn't work and there are no drivers for it on the asus website. Also the wifi seems to have a mind of its own sometimes. Its doesn't seem to want to start right away on reboot or start up. After about 3-4 mins it finally connects and I am usually good to go from there. Over all I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed with this laptop. Less than a year of use and it’s already broken. I keep my laptop in a safe place, or in the case. The front of the screen separates from the back when closing and sometimes causes the screen to flicker when open. The speed is terrible, I use it for editing photos and designing on the internet. I would not recommend this laptop to anyone. Not even a year of use and I’m already on the hunt for a new laptop. My previous HP lasted for over 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S

customer_reviews.title: Great computer. The hinge is not holding up with light use
customer_reviews.text: Its been great. Used for online teaching and zooms for kids online classes...had for 1.5 years now. have never traveled with or dropped. Left hinge is damaged, so would recommend be very careful when closing and don't put anything on top. Trying to open and screen is separating. So keep hinges strength in mind when buying a laptop. We have an HP and the hinge is a giant middle one and has held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Texas momma

customer_reviews.title: Just bad.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage. The hard drive allows for lots of storage space and quickish boot speeds (quicker the more you use it). Cheaply constructed. The processor is cheap and it will not run games well. Update... problems with network driver. Have to disable it and re-enable the network driver in order to use the wireless connection. This works sometimes. Had to uninstall the network driver 2 times now and reinstall it. Going to use my warranty to replace this piece of crap machine.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good for watching movies, but not ideal for high end...anything.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this with the expectation it will run anything consistently on high GPU settings. I bought this for running a DAW, mixing and DJ, but sadly it cannot run even low memory simultaneous programs well. Games are hit and miss with middle of the road GPU settings maxing around 20 FPS for Overwatch, but forget about playing games like ARK as the GPU lags out. Great battery life though for watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardware, iffy on the case
customer_reviews.text: Use: i run sound editing and 3d drawing software, my kid jumps on for gaming pro: performance Back lit keys heat dispersion case design Con: intermittent stalls when opening a program touch pad locks when you have your palm on resting near it battery life charger size/heat overall good, gonna need to replace at some point and wont be sad
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this computer, within a month of using it, it started crashing and wouldnt restart. my husband was able to get it to start and it continued to crash and now 3 months after purchase the hard drive crashed and is now a $800 paper weight
customer_reviews.author: amber ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Buttery Smooth Fortnite!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a good laptop for high performance Fortnite and APEX Legends gaming and this laptop delivers and looks pretty good doing it! His last laptop had an underpowered graphics card that could not handle Fortnite at a decent framerate and often times due to some strange issue would refuse the game to run at all. The graphics on the ASUS is stunning and he is able to get decent framerates with high level of detail.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Park

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with, some display complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how “thin and light” it is in context of gaming computers as I came from a tiny 11.9” netbook, but it is light enough that traveling with it isn’t cumbersome. Battery life is pretty good as well, though the display quality leaves much to be desired. I personally use it for work rather than gaming most of the time, and I loved that it has a large hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: KKL

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy packaging, damaged internals.
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped in a very thin box. Computer had no external damage that was visible. Constant restarts and blue screens when trying to boot the computer upon start up. Once getting past this point, and Windows 10 finally loaded, the updates would never completely download, and the computer would restart itself and show an error message or blue screen. Thoroughly disappointed with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: chevy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the battery to last a long time, it's a gaming laptop. I plan to have it plugged in most of the time. Works as expected. Just keep your drivers and software up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst purchase I’ve ever made! We’ve only had the computer less than a year, haven’t downloaded anything on it. Slow start up takes about 10 minutes just to get to the log in. Once you click on the internet browser, you wait a good 2-5 minutes for it to open, then the whole thing freezes and you have to re-start the computer. There goes half an hour of my day! Worthless piece of junk. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: BLAIRAH

customer_reviews.title: Good computer well-made worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Been using his computer pretty much through the month of October 2009. I woke up very much it does everything that I wanted to do and I’ve had no problems with it. Gaming is OK not exceptional and I don’t play a lot of different games but I do enjoy playing a few. I give it a four star rating just because I don’t even believe anything deserves a five star. If you choose to buy his computer you can’t go wrong. The only thing I don’t care about the computer is the finger sensing pad. I have trouble using but I am not use to laptops where I always use a desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Van

customer_reviews.title: Slow but now it works fine. // UPDATE - NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit slow at first use, but now it works fine. November 7, 2018 update: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. I sent the laptop in because it kept crashing when i was trying to load YOUTUBE..... They sent it back (to the wrong address fyi) and it was fine for like a week. Then i was trying to play maplestory 2 and the crashing returns... just spend a bit more and get a better WORKING computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Leung

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is not a light laptop. It’s actually pretty heavy. I bought this for my 13 year and it’s super slow. He added only a couple games and we now needed to delete them all for him to use it as a normal laptop. Graphics are OK. I paid less for an HP touch screen laptop for my other son and that moved so much faster and it’s graphics are great. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete OS meltdown. BSOD due to hardware conflict
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and very convenient. When it was 1 year old MS rolled out a windows update and i got a BSOD that i could not recover from. Had to reinstall with the MS software utility. Asus didn't even have an on-board recovery partition that would help... Or at least, if it dud that was scrambled also. After i reinstalled the OS (and lost everything in the process) 1 week later the Microsoft update ran and scrambled the OS again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: Smooth game playing
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and look of the laptop computer. It has a lot of features which I thought was cool. The WiFi 5ghz connection works extremely well. You get almost the full amount of the connection speed. It has an awesome hot spot feature. Still learning all the tricks to the computer. I love it. On line gaming so far has not had any lag when playing.
customer_reviews.author: rico

customer_reviews.title: I think mine is defective or this laptop sucks
customer_reviews.text: I think mine is defective so asus can I get a replacement please?? It’s super slow is always crashing and freezing load times take forever game preformce is meh at best so I would stay away unless mine is defective and it’s actually good also the hard drive makes a very loud scratching noise also the battery sucks and last not even 2 hours and when its not plugged in it drops in preformence what the heck asus this laptop sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa berry

customer_reviews.title: The speaker placement is HORRIBLE do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get a chance to see if this is good for browsing the internet or gaming because it runs SLOW. On top of that ASUS placed the speakers in the front of the laptop, meaning sounds appear as if they are only come from one speaker or the other and the audio quality IS HORRIBLE. Everything sounds muffled and the volume is low even on max volume. I will be returning this and getting a refund promptly!
customer_reviews.author: T Maltz

customer_reviews.title: Fine, But Not Reccommended.
customer_reviews.text: I only have 2 games downloaded, though one is fairly content heavy, and the computer sounds like a wind turbine whenever I run something & crashes after 2 or so hours. Its alright if you take breaks & let it cool down every hour or two, but it really can’t handle very much. Get this if you can’t afford anything else, otherwise, spend the extra couple hundred dollars and get a better computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Did all that I needed it to do. However, this laptop stopped working all of a sudden one day. Put it to sleep one night and the next day nothing. I've only had it for 18 months. Cant help but notice that the warranty was only for 12months and it just so happen to randomly stop working a week before BlackFriday. Charger and battery work fine and it was plugged into a surge protector but it will not start now. This is not an old laptop but it still just randomly died on me and for the price that I paid this is ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 20 minutes. Crashed on Chrome install and wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Upon attempting to install Google Chrome, I got "CLOCK_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT" blue screen of death error and the computer shut down. After that, trying to turn it on resulted in "WHEA_UNCORRECTABLE_ERROR". Wouldn't turn on after that. No troubleshooting methods worked. Returned for a full refund. Great service from Amazon and UPS. ASUS, not so much. Never buying an ASUS product ever again. They clearly didn't even test this $700 useless machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive machine.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a customer of asus for a few years and as my old laptop was worn out i was looking for an upgrade. The TUF is a wonderful laptop that can handle whatever game I throw at it with no effort at all. Its battery life is impressive, as I can go around the entire day before needing to charge it. The lit up keyboard is very comfortable and keys not that loud . Overall it is an impressive device that is a real bang for your buck. You don't need a crazy 1500 dollar alienware when you've got this TUF friend around.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer goblin

customer_reviews.title: Had to instantly return this product; unacceptable delivery and broken parts.
customer_reviews.text: After opening the package, I saw an enlarged box that was larger than scale of the original laptop case. It would have been fine if the package was fitted with bubble wrap or packing peanuts, but there wasn't anything but piece of brown paper to protect the laptop from damage. After opening up the laptop, I realized that the laptop was making a weird noise from the left side. Frustrated at this product, I immediately returned this product and opted to get the Dell G7 gaming laptop instead. If you are trying to get a great budget laptop for decent gaming, I would suggest an Acer Nitro 5 instead of this product.
customer_reviews.author: alan frong

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive screeching
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for 8 months, and my hard drive has recently started screeching. For those who do not know that means my hard drive is going to fail anytime now. This is unacceptable. There is no reason my hard drive should start failing 8 months into owning this pc. I have never droped it, or mistreated this laptop. I am now going to have to spend money to get a new hard drive. This is infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Computer made funny noise right from the start also the computer froze on me. I hadn’t downloaded or uploaded or even had WiFi set up and the darn thing crashed on me. Definitely some lag with simple task like open up file. Don’t know much past this because I am returning it after the first few hours of owning it. Amazon is legit about returning items so that’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: The laptop runs amazingly well, it is just what the company claims it is, the gtx1050 makes this computer a very rare but great buy to anyone who wants to enter PC gaming in a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Ridyl

customer_reviews.title: POOR product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop only a couple of months. The wifi adapter will not come close to the download speeds I have so I have to hard wire with CAT5. Then, a key went out so I was going to find a keyboard and ASUS says we don't sell parts. If you want it,I have to pay to ship it back to them and wait. I will never buy another ASUS product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Servay

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Everything is decent about this laptop as long as you don't use wifi. The wifi adapter is pute trash, wifi constantly disconnects itself and/or can't detect available WiFi networks. A quick Google search shows that this is a huge problem with other Asus laptop and netbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Miles

customer_reviews.title: horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Bought in july of 2018 for school and only lasted me about a year. Never dropped or abused and I never used it for anything but school and work and it just died without warning in the middle of a very important mid term exam. The laptop had problems since the day I got it but I was just to busy to complain to the companies tech support at the time. After spending almost a 1000$ on a laptop I expected it to last me more than a little over a year, lesson learned I will not be doing business with Asus ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice budget gaming laptop, but the battery life is non-existant and it can be a little slower than I would have expected it to be loading up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A non-touchscreen version of an excellent midrange gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Solid gaming laptop. No touchscreen but this is a plus to me since there are no fingerprints across the screen and the screen seems hardier than the touch counterpart. Redesigned cooling system is superior to previous generation, which was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop to do my schooling for AutoCAD and not only is it not keeping up for that, it runs 100% disk just on the most basic tasks. This is supposed to be a high performing and fast laptop and it can't even match my wife's outdated one that's more than 5 years old. I've tried all sorts of things to speed it up and clean it up but it is still going to 100% every time I do anything!! I know this was a used laptop but I feel very ripped off after spending almost $800 on a paper weight. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mans

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this new laptop. He tells me that the detail in the streamed games is awesome and the computer is super fast. The computer stays fairly cool and the fan is not bothersome. The only small difficulty he’s experienced is that for some reason the headphones do not work on certain games like Skyrim and Dark Souls, but otherwise we are very pleased all around with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's a really solid machine for light gaming and streaming.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really solid machine for light gaming and streaming. I do wish it had a CD drive, but that's my fault for not double-checking before buying. Warning: THERE IS NO CD DRIVE. There's also only a joint port for microphone and headphones, which makes sense for gaming I guess, but is actually kind of inconvenient. Overall, I'm really happy with it, though.
customer_reviews.author: jenovotny

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived - update 8 months later
customer_reviews.text: It seems great so far. Update: I think it's been 8 months since we bought this for my husband here on Amazon for $600. Quite a jump for an old computer that won't last a year. :( It's already unusable. I backed everything up and my husband factory reset it, still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: LoriAnn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT with a few bugs
customer_reviews.text: ok so first get rid of mcafee and get avg free or not both work great then make sure to stop superfetch from running by disabling it and then should run fine but with out those 2 things done at least your comp is screwed but runs wow un full settings fine so good enough for my gaming needs pluse can do some light vr
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so much jealously going around!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love my new computer! Battery is only good for about 3 hours when gaming. So MAKE SURE YOU ARE NEAR AN OUTLET, Everyone who has seen it is jealous of it! Every now and then I get some lag but It's probably my cable connection. all in in I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, weak chassis.
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this a 5 star because I love my asus... however the chassis has a big flaw. The joint where you close the computer breaks super easily. I am always careful with it, however it cannot withstand the pressure put on it by closing and opening. My sister bought the same computer and had the same problem. We have had to glue and epoxy the area in the same place (left side). Other than that it works great and I love it. Just needs a stronger joint.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Specs look better on paper that they actually are.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design, it's a cool looking computer. However, downloading a game such as CSGO (took 7 hours) RUST (took 1.5 days) and I have top of the line internet service. My boyfriend can down load the same games, in 10 minutes tops. Took 60 seconds to open FACEBOOOK. Just not a very good computer. It sounds like it would be amazing by the specs but in reality something is really wrong with the setup. Would NOT recommend. AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now, it's well worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Greatest purchase I've ever made, I originally bought it so that I could work on homework as I'm getting my degree in Game Developement, so I figured a gaming laptop should be able to handle the programs to make a game essentially and I was right. This laptop handles everything I throw at it and handles it well from 3D modelling software to 3D Animation. I'm happy to say this computer is well worth the price tag and is a welcome addition to my set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive specs apparently don't make a good computer
customer_reviews.text: It's an expensive paperweight that can barely even manage to play youtube videos at 1080p without freezing. I don't know how it can have hardware that is so much better than my last computer and yet barely even manage to function.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Pure Joy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Asus TUF gaming rig, running WoW on ultra at 100fps. Pure Joy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little cheap/delicate but hey, it's ASUS.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laptop actually. The casing feels really fragile so this is a laptop you're gonna need to take care of, but other than that it performs great. Recommended for the good price.
customer_reviews.author: John Hawkey

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: 1) The plastic material they make this laptop out of is terrible. There's no metal (or harder material) support except in required places. 2) I feel like I've had to do more software and hardware maintenance on this laptop more than my $400 i3 dell laptop I've had for 4 years. Great graphics and storage, and pretty simple motherboard layout, but if you're looking for a long lasting, no maintenance laptop, I'd advice moving on
customer_reviews.author: Patrick, a fellow shopper

customer_reviews.title: Made it though Iraq
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop before i deployed to Iraq. Not only did it survive the heat and the sand it played some games decently. PUBG will play on here with lower setting but still is very nice. I did add a 1T SSD and upgraded to 32g of ram and made this thing even more alive. Well worth the original cost and I recomend at least adding another stick of ram and adding an SSD as your main HD and the HDD as mass storage.
customer_reviews.author: elijah

customer_reviews.title: Thankful I gave it a chance
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this computer. It's fast and it handles my games well. I was also pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound I heard from the speakers. I'm glad I didn't listen to the reviews. Best laptop I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Best buy at price point
customer_reviews.text: You're not going to find a better laptop for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Overall the ASUS FX504GD-ES51 Gaming Laptop is a quality machine. I use it for gaming, game development, and various other things and this laptop has been able to handle each thing with ease. It works well for various game engines like Unity and Ren'Py as well as various art softwares. The only real issue I've run into is the batter life is very average, but that may be a result of my chosen performance level is on the medium-high end.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wallace Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A quality laptop for today’s games
customer_reviews.text: Works great can play anything up to this year though don’t expect to max out settings on most recent games. Will run malt total war games smooth.
customer_reviews.author: omar khan

customer_reviews.title: For the price it us not bad.But try and bye a laptop for 100 more.It will be more worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's losses its performance the more you use it.For example I was getting around 100+fps with decent settings, now I'm getting from 30-90 FPS with really low settings. Also one of the screws is stripted on the back of the laptop and I can't upgrade it because of that reason.It also gets a lot of dust which commonly happens.Also doesn't have a lot of imports for the mouse and stuff like that.The speakers are good.Keyboard isnt really
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother and he absolutely loves it, great quality fast and he has no issues playing games and doing school work on it
customer_reviews.author: Mr Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works great
customer_reviews.text: My son got this to play games on while in the Army. He loves it and said it works very well for what he paid. Good screen quality and is able to play the newer games on it.
customer_reviews.author: ShaiLynn

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mid level gaming laptop. I totally feel that I recieved a better product than the price implied. It's able to handle skyrim with like 90 ridiculous mods before the frame rate becomes terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty disk
customer_reviews.text: I have had the worst experience with this laptop. I've been getting the 100 percent disk error and I've tried everything. Even contacted Asus support and they didnt help. Do yourself a favor and pick a different brand. Even if you have to shell out more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be 699 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Can't run fallout 4,But can run fallout 76. :s Didn't have any issues, but the 8gigs ram and diskdrive seem to be lacking, like it's only running half it's capacity. Lags terribly on fallout 4 even on lowest setting s. Wouldn't recommend for triple A games,but Indy games is great to play with.
customer_reviews.author: David Tinoco

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome computer! I use it everyday for emails and surfing the web. However, it is great at streaming videos and watching anything you like on the internet. I added eight more gigabytes of RAM to make it an even faster computer, which rendered me completely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Solid for an IT professional
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty solid machine. Not sure where all the negative reviews are comming from. It can use an SSD drive and and an extra 8 gb of ram, but for the price point of 599, I cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought 2 the core i 7 and the 5 for my boys, early Christmas gift. The core i 5 overheated after playing on it for a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne D-Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product for the price. working great for gaming. fast.
customer_reviews.author: Linnae

customer_reviews.title: its amazing thanks :D
customer_reviews.text: its amazing nothing was broken when it came in and it works really good on the games i tried [it works good on fortnite but not on the highest setting but on good settings] but when it first came in the key board wasn't working so that scared me a bit but just turn it off and on and it started working
customer_reviews.author: Sattam

customer_reviews.title: Solid system
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laptop for the price. I had issues initially, but uninstalling McAfee solved all of them. McAfee really trashes the systems ability to do literally anything. System plays Minecraft and Warframe beautifully without having to lower settings at all. I'm really pleased with this laptop so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop! It's perfect for my games. Just thr eight size and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Been having issues with the laptop that i purchased and been trying to get in contact with asus but no luck always get re routed or hard to use customer service. My keyboard keys have been not properly working for sometime. Hopping maybe someone will contact me regarding this .
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: A powerful laptop with some worrying issues, Get a Warranty.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very soild, the 1TB is good, and it can run modern games. Sadly this computer has some noticeable issues with it's Wifi Card. I've had to return one of these already because the Wifi Card stoped working and I could not get it fixed no matter what I tried without violating the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: My first laptop
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for about a year and the main issue with this laptop is stopcode - blue screen. The last blue screen I got was memory management stopcode. After the reset I decided to turn off my computer and now it won't boot. Another issue
customer_reviews.author: Martel Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Great  specs. But doesn't have 2.0 hdmi or USB c
customer_reviews.text: Great Great specs... except doesn't have 2.0 hdmi or USB c
customer_reviews.author: JHP

customer_reviews.title: Good  Budget gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew looks nice plays games very well
customer_reviews.author: Old Man Tator

customer_reviews.title: If you like money, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, we've had this since Sep 2018 and the hard drive has completely failed. For $800 I expect a laptop to last longer than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value with dedicated video cards
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my boys to play Fortnite on. They work great, good battery life, and I think they will make very functional laptops for school as well. Note - they are larger and not exactly portable for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for school. I haven't had a chance to use as a gaming computer but it's a really amazing computer. Very durable as it fell and it had zero damage. The keys light up nicely and it's not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: Great value from Prime Day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime Day, very pleased. Not actually a true “gaming” platform but works well and strikes a really good price/performance point.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: purchased for my son to play video games online
customer_reviews.text: It does not work property. It glitches and moves slowly. He is very frustrated and upset and now I feel like I spent quiet a bit of money on something he can not even use. Do not buy this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Eilene

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, it looks really nice and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Graziella Coutinho

customer_reviews.title: Wifi
customer_reviews.text: I’ve started the laptop like normal connected it to WiFi then started downloading games then now the WiFi doesn’t work and now I need to use an Ethernet cable which is a big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer and Services
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did well shopping experience.. the only disadvantage is win 10 bundle too much useless software, especially the auto update and defender, recommend to remove both and you will enjoy the perfect computing.
customer_reviews.author: Snowshone2k

customer_reviews.title: Slow and worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Slow and wouldn't downolad or open games. Horrible. Very disappointed. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in February 2019 and it can now not even run a single browser. It has horrible lag issues with even the simplest of programs open, and this is after deleting dozens of random bloatware files that came pre-installed. I bought this for my husband to game with but now I can't even browse the web?!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Brady

customer_reviews.title: Missing component and not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought it like new condition in box and it's missing the power adapter ordered one for 6.75 but it makes me nervous that it didn't have it in box so I order a replacement cord and sure enough I turn it on the the white screen of death if the inspection on this item was done properly none of these issues would have happened
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Great budget performance
customer_reviews.text: Great budget gaming laptop. Feels sturdy and the battery life is great. I don't think you could find a better gaming laptop for the money. Keyboard feels great too
customer_reviews.author: Chance Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Keys fall off!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for son, and a week later (New Years eve) keys are falling off!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best laptop I have invested in
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best laptop I have invested in. I've been using it daily since I purchased it and I am extremely satisfied. It runs everything I need it to without any problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Abe G.

customer_reviews.title: Best computer i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Personal and company use and great for gaming! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: How has it already had hardware problems?
customer_reviews.text: I have literally had this brand new laptop in my possession for 20 hours, and it’s screen has already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good ENTRY level gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: This computer was purchased for my wife so that she could play WOW with me. So far it has been doing a great job, only skipping when McAfee tries to open.....
customer_reviews.author: SoonToBeSlimmerDude

product_meta.title: ASUS TUF Thin & Light Gaming Laptop PC (FX504) 15.6” Full HD, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H (up to 3.9GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 2GB, 8GB DDR4 2666 MHz, 1TB FireCuda SSHD, Windows 10 64-bit - FX504GD-ES51
product_meta.description: Style:TN | 1TB Firecuda | GTX 1050Asus TUF Gaming FX504 is a powerful Windows 10 Gaming Laptop that combines gaming performance with an extended lifespan, thanks to its patented anti-dust cooling (ADC) system. Infused with the spirit of the ultimate Force (TUF) and designed to strike fear into the heart of the enemy, The durable and lightweight FX504 is the first laptop in the TUF Gaming family. Equipped with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or GTX 1050 It graphics and an 8th-Generation Intel Core i5-8300H Processor: FX504 is able to play the latest games and multitask With ease. FX504 uses high-frequency DDR4 2666MHz RAM and Seagate Fireside solid state Hybrid Drive to ensure smooth performance. FX504 features one of the fastest Wi-Fi standards available - The latest Intel 802. 11AC Wave 2 boasts data transfer rates of up to an incredible 1. 7Gbps. To top it all off, it's red-backlit gaming keyboard is rated at 20-million keystroke durability. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3. 0, 3. 1 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment.
feature_bullets: Durability - Dual fans with anti-dust technology. Red-backlit keyboard rated for 20-million keystroke durability
Portable design gaming Laptop with 0.98" Thin profile and weight of only 5.07 lbs
8th Generation Intel Core i5-8300H Processor and GeForce GTX 1050 2GB for superior gaming performance and multitasking
8GB DDR4 2666MHz RAM | 1TB FireCuda SSHD | Windows 10 Home
Gigabit wave 2 Wi-Fi up to 1.73Gbps with 2x2 802.11ac
NOTE:Please refer to the user manual before use and for trouble shooting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars429 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
